summary: WHEN RIDING DOWN THE ROAD ON MY BIKE THE REAR WHEEL SUDDENLY LOCKED UP. I'VE BEEN IN CONTACT WOTH CYCLE WORKS CALGARY AND STACY HADAWAY, REGIONAL MANAGER OF ROYAL ENFIELD  AND SHOWED THEM WRITTEN PROOF OF A RECALL ON THE 2009 PRODUCTION MODELS BUT THEY ARE CLAIMING MY BIKE IS NOT HAVING THE ISSUE DESCRIBED IN NHTSA CAMPAIGN RECALL 09V235000. YET THEY HAVE NOT EVEN SEEN THE BIKE. WHEN THE REAR WHEEL LOCKED UP I ALMOST FELL OFF THE BIKE WHEN OT STARTED SKIDDING. LUCKILY I WAS ONLY GOING 50 KPH.
